product_overview: An integrated web-based platform designed to manage automotive service operations including bookings, orders, inventory, customer communication, and reporting with a modern UI and efficient workflow.
core_goals: Provide a centralized dashboard for system overview and quick insights.
Enable efficient management of customer bookings and appointments with multi-vehicle support.
Streamline order management with bulk operations, notes, reminders, and attachments.
Offer real-time inventory tracking and status management for vehicles and parts.
Facilitate customer communication through a call list and outreach tracking.
Support historical data archiving with the ability to restore items.
Implement a customizable and dynamic data grid for detailed data interaction.
Deliver a global search across all data modules for quick access.
Allow user-customizable settings including appearance, status management, and history.
Incorporate an alert and notification system for important updates and actions.
Ensure seamless data integrity and syncing via Supabase with query management.
Automate workflow transitions such as moving vehicles to call list when conditions are met.
key_features: Dashboard page displaying statistics, charts, and calendar widgets for overview.
Booking Calendar with dark theme, detailed customer and vehicle scheduling, multi-VIN support.
Order Management system with interactive data grid, modal dialogs for editing notes, reminders, and attachments.
Active Inventory tracking with status updates, sheet locking, and workflow management.
Call List functionality for managing customer call queues and statuses.
Archive system with reorder capability to move items back to active orders.
Advanced AG-Grid implementation for dynamic editing, filtering, and custom renderers.
Global Search feature spanning VINs, customer names, parts, and companies.
Tabbed Settings Modal including Part Status, Booking Status, Theme, and History management.
Robust Notifications System with alert badges and contextual navigation.
Row Modals to edit grid row data efficiently.
State management via Zustand with segmented slices for individual data domains.
Supabase backed service layer integrated with React Query for optimized data fetching and caching.
Automatic Workflow for moving VINs to Call List upon fulfillment of parts arrival.
Reusable UI components based on Radix UI primitives and Tailwind CSS styling.
user_flow_summary: User logs in and lands on the Dashboard showing system overview with charts and calendar.
User navigates to Booking Calendar to schedule, view, or manage customer appointments and vehicles.
From Orders Management, user creates or updates orders, adding notes, reminders, and attachments as needed.
User tracks vehicle inventory status and updates progress within the Main Sheet interface.
Call List page is used to manage outbound calls and customer follow-up communication.
Users search across all data tabs using Global Search for quick data retrieval.
Settings Modal allows user to customize statuses, UI themes, and manage history.
Notifications alert user to updates which can be clicked to navigate and auto-scroll to relevant entries.
Archive page used to review historical orders and restore them back into active workflow if necessary.
Automated system workflows move VINs between states based on business rules like parts arrival completion.
validation_criteria: All key features are implemented as per requirements and accessible through the UI.
Booking Calendar supports multi-vehicle scheduling and persists customer appointments correctly.
Order management supports bulk operations and individual note/reminder/attachment editing.
Inventory updates reflect accurately and support sheet locking functionality.
Call List accurately tracks call statuses and allows queue management.
Archive system correctly archives and restores items without data loss.
Global search returns relevant results across all data domains with acceptable performance.
Settings Modal saves and applies user preferences successfully including theme changes.
Notifications display real-time alerts with functional navigation and auto-scroll.
Automated workflow moves VINs as specified after parts arrival conditions are fulfilled.
System passes all unit and integration tests including Vitest and Playwright E2E tests.
UI components adhere to design standards with responsive layouts and accessibility compliance.
